Configuration.Name: L1=L2=8m_central
Configuration.SetupScript: config.wavelength = 6 config.wavelength_spread = 0.1 #config.wavelength_spread = 0.064 config.det = 7200 config.det_offset = -5 config.srce = 180 config.guide = 'g5' config.apx = -98 config.bs = 2 config.beamcenterx = 90.83 config.beamcenterz = 95.60 config.drive()
